titles.title: Recognizing the accomplishments of professional surfer and surfwear executive Danny Kwock.
Recognizing the accomplishments of professional surfer and surfwear executive Danny Kwock.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes the accomplishments of professional surfer and surfwear executive Danny Kwock and his role in establishing coastal Orange County, California, as a focal point of the surf industry.
